text: Christopher Kamara (born 25 December 1957), often named as Chris Kamara and nicknamed as "Kammy", is an English former professional footballer, manager. He is also a current presenter for ITV television show Ninja Warrior UK alongside Ben Shephard and Rochelle Humes since the show was founded. He worked as a presenter and football analyst for Sky Sports from 1992 to 2022. Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:English football managers
title: Chris Kamara
